title: AI-Powered Code Review Assistant
subtitle: Open Source
overview: Intelligent code review tool using GPT-4 to provide automated feedback on pull requests, reducing review time by 40%.

details.description: A VS Code extension that analyzes code changes and provides intelligent suggestions for improvements, bug detection, and best practices.
details.problem: Code reviews are time-consuming and often miss subtle bugs or style inconsistencies.
details.approach: Integrated GPT-4 API with custom prompts for code analysis. Built VS Code extension using TypeScript and implemented caching for performance.
details.impact: 1,000+ downloads, 4.8/5 star rating, featured in VS Code marketplace. Reduced average code review time by 40% in beta testing.

title: Real-Time Collaborative Whiteboard
subtitle: Personal Project
overview: Web-based collaborative whiteboard with real-time synchronization, supporting 100+ concurrent users per room.

details.description: A feature-rich collaborative whiteboard application with drawing tools, shapes, text, and real-time collaboration using WebSockets.
details.problem: Existing whiteboard solutions were expensive or lacked real-time collaboration features.
details.approach: Built with React for frontend, Node.js + Socket.io for real-time communication, and Canvas API for drawing. Implemented operational transformation for conflict resolution.
details.impact: Used by 5,000+ users. Featured on Product Hunt with 200+ upvotes.

title: Smart Expense Tracker
subtitle: Mobile App
overview: Mobile app for tracking expenses with AI-powered categorization and budget insights, 10K+ downloads.

details.description: Cross-platform mobile app that automatically categorizes expenses using machine learning and provides personalized budget recommendations.
details.problem: Manual expense tracking is tedious and people often lose track of spending patterns.
details.approach: Built with React Native for cross-platform support. Implemented ML model for expense categorization using TensorFlow.js. Used Firebase for backend.
details.impact: 10,000+ downloads, 4.5/5 rating on app stores. Helped users save an average of $200/month.

title: DevOps Automation Toolkit
subtitle: CLI Tool
overview: Command-line tool for automating common DevOps tasks, reducing deployment setup time from hours to minutes.

details.description: A comprehensive CLI toolkit that automates infrastructure provisioning, CI/CD setup, and monitoring configuration.
details.problem: Setting up DevOps infrastructure for new projects was repetitive and error-prone.
details.approach: Built with Python and Click framework. Integrated with AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes APIs. Created templates for common setups.
details.impact: 500+ GitHub stars. Reduced infrastructure setup time by 80% for new projects.
